XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle mod/extension - time extensions for Moodle activities.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the student requesting an extension.

FIELD.NAME: activitycmid
FIELD.COMMENT: The course_modules id of the activity to which this extension relates.

FIELD.NAME: reason
FIELD.COMMENT: Reason given by student to justify the extension.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Status of the extension application: 0 = Pending 1 = Approved 2 = Rejected

FIELD.NAME: lengthrequested
FIELD.COMMENT: Length of time requested, in seconds (for ease of use with unix timestamps).

FIELD.NAME: lengthgranted
FIELD.COMMENT: Length of time granted, in seconds (for ease of use with unix epoch timestamps).

FIELD.NAME: privatenotes
FIELD.COMMENT: Space for text from staff, discussing the extension request.

FIELD.NAME: studentmessage
FIELD.COMMENT: Space for comments back to the student when the extension is approved/rejected.

FIELD.NAME: approvalconfirmed
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag for Registry to set when they confirm the extension is acceptable. No status changes should be visible to the student until this is set.

FIELD.NAME: timeconfirmed
FIELD.COMMENT: Time that approvalconfirmed was set, for auditing.

FIELD.NAME: sharedetails
FIELD.COMMENT: Does student permit sharing of request details
